00031   inline bool ReverseFlag() { return (b->core.flag&BAM_FREVERSE) != 0; }
00032 
00034   inline bool MateReverseFlag() { return (b->core.flag&BAM_FMREVERSE) != 0; }
00035   
00037     inline int32_t Position() { return b->core.pos; }
00038 
00040     inline int32_t MatePosition() { return b->core.mpos; }
00041 
00043     inline int32_t ChrID() { return b->core.tid; }
00044

00047 
00049     inline bool MappedFlag() { return !(b->core.flag&BAM_FUNMAP); }
00050 
00052     inline bool MateMappedFlag() { return !(b->core.flag&BAM_FMUNMAP); }
00053         
00055     inline int32_t MapQuality() { return b->core.qual; }
00056 
00058     inline int32_t CigarSize() { return b->core.n_cigar; }
00059 
00061     inline bool FirstFlag() { return (b->core.flag&BAM_FREAD1); }
00062 
00064     inline std::string Qname() { return std::string(bam_get_qname(b)); }
00065 
00067     inline char* QnameChar() { return bam_get_qname(b); }
00068 
00070     inline int32_t AlignmentFlag() { return b->core.flag; }

00073     inline int32_t InsertSize() { return b->core.isize; } 
00074 
00076     inline int32_t Length() { return b->core.l_qseq; }
00077 
00079     inline std::string Sequence() { 
00080       uint8_t * p = bam_get_seq(b);
00081       char c[b->core.l_qseq+1]; // need +1 for \0 at end
00082       for (int32_t i = 0; i < b->core.l_qseq; ++i)
00083         c[i] = BASES[bam_seqi(p, i)];
00084       c[b->core.l_qseq] = '\0'; // null terminate for proper std::string construciton
00085       return std::string(c);
00086     }
00087 
00089     inline int32_t NumSoftClip() {
00090       int32_t p = 0;
00091       uint32_t* c = bam_get_cigar(b);
00092       for (int32_t i = 0; i < b->core.n_cigar; ++i)
00093         if (c[i] & BAM_CSOFT_CLIP)
00094           p += bam_cigar_oplen(c[i]);
00095       return p;
00096     }
00097 
00099     inline int32_t NumClip() {
00100       int32_t p = 0;
00101       uint32_t* c = bam_get_cigar(b);
00102       for (int32_t i = 0; i < b->core.n_cigar; ++i)
00103         if ( (c[i] & BAM_CSOFT_CLIP) || (c[i] & BAM_CHARD_CLIP) )
00104           p += bam_cigar_oplen(c[i]);
00105       return p;
00106     }
00107 
00112     inline std::string GetZTag(const std::string& tag) {
00113       uint8_t* p = bam_aux_get(b,tag.c_str());
00114       if (!p)
00115         return "";
00116       return std::string(bam_aux2Z(p));
00117         
00118     }
